meanings.definition: The act of turning a story or text into a musical.
meanings.sent1: The musicalization of the classic novel brought it to life on stage.
meanings.sent2: The musicalization of the movie made it more entertaining for the audience.
meanings.sent3: The musicalization of the cookbook turned recipes into catchy songs.
meanings.sent4: Her musicalization of the poem turned words into beautiful melodies.
meanings.sent5: The musicalization of the historical event made it unforgettable through music.

meanings.definition: The process of adding music to a film or play.
meanings.sent1: During the musicalization of the play, the songs were carefully chosen.
meanings.sent2: The musicalization of the film enhanced the emotional impact of the scenes.
meanings.sent3: The musicalization of the school play made the audience tap their feet.
meanings.sent4: His musicalization of the movie transformed it into a symphony of sound.
meanings.sent5: The musicalization of the play turned it into a harmonious masterpiece.

meanings.definition: The transformation of a non-musical work into a musical production.
meanings.sent1: The musicalization of the book created a captivating stage show.
meanings.sent2: The musicalization of the novel added depth to the characters' emotions.
meanings.sent3: The musicalization of the painting turned it into a lively performance.
meanings.sent4: The musicalization of the play turned it into a vibrant musical extravaganza.
meanings.sent5: The musicalization of the story brought a new dimension to the narrative through music.
